BackstoryDef.title: Buenos Aires Survivor
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a civilian in Buenos Aires when the Arachnid plasma bolt struck the city, killing millions. [PAWN_pronoun] watched friends and family die in the firestorm. The next day, [PAWN_nameDef] enlisted in the Mobile Infantry. [PAWN_possessive] service is not about citizenship—it's about revenge. Every bug killed is one less monster in the universe.

BackstoryDef.title: Federal Service Idealist
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up believing in the Federation's principles: that citizenship must be earned through service and sacrifice. Unlike many who join for benefits, [PAWN_nameDef] truly believes that Federal Service creates better citizens. [PAWN_pronoun] volunteered to prove [PAWN_possessive] worth and serve humanity's greater good.

BackstoryDef.title: Farm Kid Enlists
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on a frontier agricultural colony, dreaming of adventure among the stars. When Federation recruiters came through offering citizenship and a way off the farm, [PAWN_nameDef] jumped at the chance. Boot camp was harder than any harvest, but [PAWN_pronoun] learned to be a soldier.

BackstoryDef.title: Second-Generation Trooper
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s parents were both Mobile Infantry veterans. [PAWN_pronoun] grew up on military bases, surrounded by service culture. Enlisting was never a question—it was destiny. [PAWN_nameDef] carries the family tradition and aims to earn the same respect [PAWN_possessive] parents commanded.

BackstoryDef.title: Seeking Redemption
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] had a troubled youth—petty crimes, bad decisions, wasted potential. The Mobile Infantry was [PAWN_possessive] last chance to make something of [PAWN_objective]. Federal Service doesn't care about your past; it only cares whether you can complete your term. [PAWN_nameDef] fights to prove [PAWN_pronoun] is more than [PAWN_possessive] mistakes.

BackstoryDef.title: Combat Drop Veteran
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has survived over forty combat drops onto hostile worlds. [PAWN_pronoun] has seen troopers die in drop capsules, watched entire platoons get overrun, and pulled wounded soldiers from burning wreckage. [PAWN_nameDef] is a hardened professional who trains new recruits with brutal honesty: "The enemy will try to kill you. I'm here to teach you how to kill them first."

BackstoryDef.title: Technical Specialist
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] joined Federal Service with technical aptitude scores in the 95th percentile. Instead of frontline combat, [PAWN_pronoun] was assigned to Mobile Infantry technical support—maintaining powered armor, weapons systems, and communications gear. [PAWN_nameDef] keeps the squad operational, one repair at a time.

BackstoryDef.title: Medic "Doc"
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] completed Federal Service medical training and now serves as a combat medic with Mobile Infantry units. [PAWN_pronoun] has saved dozens of lives under fire and watched just as many die despite [PAWN_possessive] best efforts. Every trooper who walks away from [PAWN_possessive] care is a victory against death itself.

BackstoryDef.title: Academy Graduate Officer
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] enlisted in Federal Service and distinguished [PAWN_objective] in combat, earning a recommendation to Officer Candidate School. [PAWN_pronoun] graduated in the top 15% and received a commission as a Mobile Infantry officer. [PAWN_nameDef] leads from the front and never asks troopers to do anything [PAWN_pronoun] wouldn't do.

BackstoryDef.title: Battlefield Commission
BackstoryDef.description: When [PAWN_nameDef]'s platoon commander was killed by enemy fire, [PAWN_pronoun] took command and led the survivors through a fighting withdrawal under impossible odds. For [PAWN_possessive] actions, [PAWN_nameDef] received a battlefield commission to Lieutenant. [PAWN_pronoun] earned respect the hard way—in blood.

BackstoryDef.title: Federal Recruiter
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] completed [PAWN_possessive] Federal Service term with distinction and chose to continue serving as a recruiter. [PAWN_pronoun] travels frontier worlds, offering civilians the opportunity to earn citizenship through service. "Service guarantees citizenship," [PAWN_nameDef] tells them—and means it.

BackstoryDef.title: Federation Scientist
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] earned citizenship through Federal Service as a research technician and continued working in Federation R and D. [PAWN_pronoun] develops improved equipment, weapons, and armor for Mobile Infantry forces. [PAWN_nameDef] may not fight on the front lines, but [PAWN_possessive] work saves trooper lives.
